query.name: Pre-Cleanup - Remove Previous Test Data
query.description: Ensures clean state by removing any leftover objects from previous failed runs

query.name: Create Data Leak Test Table
query.description: Creates table with 10000 records for SELECT anomaly testing
query.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS data_leak_test (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(100), email VARCHAR(100), ssn VARCHAR(11), credit_card VARCHAR(16), address TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, INDEX idx_customer (customer_name))

query.name: Insert Test Data
query.description: Insert 10000 test records with sensitive data
query.query: INSERT INTO data_leak_test (customer_name, email, ssn, credit_card, address) VALUES (CONCAT('Customer_', FLOOR(RAND() * 10000)), CONCAT('user', FLOOR(RAND() * 10000), '@example.com'), CONCAT(LPAD(FLOOR(RAND() * 1000000000), 9, '0'), '-', LPAD(FLOOR(RAND() * 100), 2, '0')), LPAD(FLOOR(RAND() * 10000000000000000), 16, '0'), CONCAT(FLOOR(RAND() * 9999), ' Main St, City, State'))

query.name: Baseline SELECT Hour 1
query.description: Hour 1 baseline - 50 SELECT operations with varied queries
query.query: SELECT * FROM data_leak_test WHERE id = FLOOR(1 + RAND() * 10000) LIMIT 1

query.name: Baseline SELECT Hour 2
query.description: Hour 2 baseline - 50 SELECT operations with WHERE clause
query.query: SELECT customer_name, email FROM data_leak_test WHERE id BETWEEN FLOOR(RAND() * 5000) AND FLOOR(RAND() * 5000) + 10 LIMIT 10

query.name: Baseline SELECT Hour 3
query.description: Hour 3 baseline - 50 SELECT operations with aggregation
query.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total, AVG(id) as avg_id FROM data_leak_test WHERE id < FLOOR(RAND() * 10000)

query.name: Baseline SELECT Hour 4
query.description: Hour 4 baseline - 50 SELECT operations with ORDER BY
query.query: SELECT id, customer_name, email FROM data_leak_test ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 20

query.name: ANOMALY SPIKE - Massive SELECT Operations
query.description: HOUR 5 ANOMALY: 1000 rapid SELECT operations - 20x normal rate indicating data exfiltration attempt
query.query: SELECT * FROM data_leak_test WHERE id = FLOOR(1 + RAND() * 10000) LIMIT 100

query.name: Verify SELECT Operations
query.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_records, MIN(id) as min_id, MAX(id) as max_id FROM data_leak_test
